text: The Met Gala 2017 has arrived! On the first Monday in May, the Met Gala red carpet is one of the most-watched fashion events of the year and, this year, celebrates the opening of the Costume Institute’s exhibition Katy Perry is our cohost and cochair this evening, Cindy Chao jewelry having recently tried out several of Kawakubo’s most outrageous Comme des Garçons designs for the May issue of Vogue . Follow along to see Perry and all of the best-dressed celebrities as they make their way up the 150-foot-long red carpet and into the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s Temple of Dendur for the party of the year. The attire calls for avant-garde black tie, and the guests are sure to shine big, bold, and bright tonight.
title: Met Gala 2017 Red Carpet Live: All the Celebrity Dresses and Fashion
